quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.body: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy

quotes.name: Frank Sinatra
quotes.body: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy

quotes.name: W.C. Fields
quotes.body: Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.

quotes.name: Plato
quotes.body: He was a wise man who invented beer.

quotes.name: H.L. Mencken
quotes.body: 24 hours in a day. 24 beers in a case. Coincidence? I think not.

quotes.name: Winston Churchill
quotes.body: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.

quotes.name: Brendan Behan
quotes.body: I only take a drink on two occasions – when I’m thirsty and when I’m not

quotes.name: George F. Burns
quotes.body: It takes only one drink to get me drunk. The trouble is, I can’t remember if it’s the thirteenth or the fourteenth

quotes.name: W.C Fields
quotes.body: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.

quotes.name: Louis Pasteur
quotes.body: A bottle of wine contains more philosophy that all the books in the world.

quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway
quotes.body: I drink to make other people more interesting.

quotes.name: Homer Simpson
quotes.body: Here’s to alcohol, the cause of, and solution to all life’s problems.
